descript.abstract: Core characterization & analysis data are in progress and include core processing outline, thermal conductivity results, and core descriptions (cryo-structure). These data will be updated with geochemical, isotopic, and geophysical soil properties as analyses are completed.
descript.purpose: Geochemical, isotopic, and geophysical characterization to support modeling and process interpretation, based on depth and microtopography in Barrow (AK).

spdom.descgeog: Intensive site 0 and 1 (L2 and AB corridors), DTLB-1 and DTLB-2 corridors

idinfo.useconst: No use constraints are associated with this data.
idinfo.datacred: Heather Throckmorton (hthrockmorton@lanl.gov), Alexander Kholodov (akholodov@gi.alaska.edu), Craig Ulrich <culrich@lbl.gov>, Garrett Altmann (gla@lanl.gov), Yuxin Wu (ywu3@lbl.gov)

cntaddr.address: MS J495, SM-30 Bikini Atoll Rd

qattracc.attraccv: No formal uncertainty assessments were conducted and no estimates of uncertainty are reported.

dataqual.logic: Data are considered of good quality in the context of the information presented in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.
dataqual.complete: Data are considered complete in the context of the information presented in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

method.methdesc: Cores were initially collected by a collaborative team (LANL, LBNL, UAF) using 2" and 3" auger soil core retrievals in Barrow, Alaska from April 28 - May 7, 2013. CT scans were completed, annotated, and later split into intervals for sub-sampling.

cntperp.cntorg: Next-Generation Ecosystem Experiments (NGEE) Arctic Project, Oak Ridge National Laboratory

cntaddr.address: MS J495, SM-30 Bikini Atoll Rd

metainfo.metstdn: FDGC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata and Biological Data Profile
